attributes.additional_details: Clozapine is a drug used to treat severe mania and schizophrenia deaths.  In it's infancy as a new drug, it was marketed as the 'drug of last resort' during acute care setting episodes of the above, however, it is being used more commonplace as a treatment today.  There is a moderate to high risk of patients developing heart problems from this drug (myocardius/pericarditus) premature death and in 60 cases/year - sudden death.  Sign this e-petition if you feel N.I.C.E should be forced to investigate the usage of this drug and carry out renewed safety checks. Thanks
